channel.title: Engine Error - Could not load library client
channel.description:
Hello. After lots of issues with hl2.exe not working, I finally got this game to work. I must say it is truly amazing, and I've enjoyed it enourmously. What I like most with this 'mod' is that Black Mesa now finally looks like a place to do research. All very credible. Nice work.
Now for the problem... About two days ago I wanted to play it through again, and when I Launched the game from Steam, I had to wait for it to update Black Mesa and the SDK. When it finished, I started the game and now I get this error:
Engine error Could not load library client.
So....how do I fix this?

item.title: Engine Error - Could not load library client
item.dc:creator: fsSnowboard
item.description:
My SDK just updated as well and it broke.

Read full topic

After lots of issues with hl2.exe not working, I finally got this game to work. I must say it is truly amazing, and I’ve enjoyed it enourmously. What I like most with this ‘mod’ is that Black Mesa now finally looks like a place to do research. All very credible. Nice work.
